davenport.neighborhoods: Downtown, Village of East Davenport, Prospect Hill
davenport.meetingHighlights: Part of the Quad Cities with a mix of downtown and neighborhood meetings; several evening and speaker meetings.
davenport.transitInfo: Davenport is served by Bettendorf Transit and regional bus connections; easy access via I-74 and I-80/280 nearby.

des-moines.neighborhoods: Downtown, East Village, Sherman Hill, Beaverdale, Drake, West Des Moines (nearby)
des-moines.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse meeting schedule across downtown and suburbs, with many lunchtime, evening, and specialty groups.
des-moines.transitInfo: Des Moines Area Regional Transit (DART) provides city bus service; Des Moines International Airport serves national flights.

cedar-rapids.neighborhoods: Downtown, NewBo, Czech Village, Kingston, Bever Park
cedar-rapids.meetingHighlights: Strong community meetings with several specialty and open discussion groups, plus active newcomer support.
cedar-rapids.transitInfo: CR Transit provides local buses; regional driving via I-380 and US-151.

iowa-city.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meeting schedule with many student-friendly, lunchtime, and evening groups; strong service structure.
iowa-city.transitInfo: Iowa City Transit serves local routes; close to Eastern Iowa Airport for regional flights.

sioux-city.meetingHighlights: Regional meetings serving northwest Iowa with steady attendance and variety of meeting formats.
sioux-city.transitInfo: Sioux City Transit provides local routes; Sioux Gateway Airport serves regional flights.

ames.meetingHighlights: College-town meetings with schedules catering to students and local residents; active noon and evening meetings.
ames.transitInfo: CyRide and regional buses provide local transit; easy driving access via I-35.

waterloo.meetingHighlights: Neighborhood and downtown meetings with a mix of formats; shared resources with Cedar Falls meetings.
waterloo.transitInfo: MET Transit provides local bus service; regional highway access via US-20.
